summary: An Ordinance granting permission to A. W. Mylroie to improve 31st Avenue Northeast, from East 57th Street to East 60th Street; and East 57th Street, from 30th Avenue Northeast to 31st Avenue Northeast, by grading the same, constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary cross walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, at his own cost and expense, under certain terms and conditions.
